title: Trump: 'Bullsh*t Impeachment'
text:
President Trump held a rally in Louisiana on Friday night, and he did not mince words about his opponents.

Trump told the crowd that “The Democrats’ policies are crazy, their politicians are corrupt, their candidates are terrible, and they know they can’t win on election day, so they’re pursuing an illegal, invalid, and unconstitutional bullsh*t impeachment.”

TRUMP: “They know they can’t win on Election Day so they’re pursuing an illegal, invalid, and Unconstitutional Bullshit Impeachment” pic.twitter.com/46Rx5DmOWr — ALX ?????? (@alx) October 12, 2019

His summary of the Democrats was met with wild applause.

The president also had some thoughts on House Speaker Nancy Pelosi. Trump told his supporters that "Nancy Pelosi hates the country because she wouldn't be doing this to the country if she didn't."

President Trump rails against Speaker Pelosi: "I used to think she loved the country — she hates the country ... Nancy Pelosi hates the United States of America because she wouldn't be doing this." pic.twitter.com/R7meOSQhCb — NBC News (@NBCNews) October 12, 2019

Louisianans have an election tomorrow night, and Trump gave marching orders to the crowd: "Tomorrow you will head to the polls and you will vote to replace a liberal Democrat who has sold you out -- John Bel Edwards with a great new Republican governor," as reported by ABC News.

On Thursday night, the president held a rally in Minneapolis where he told the Democrats to "go ahead" and vote on Impeachment. He also shared his harshest opinion of Joe Biden yet. Townhall's Cortney O'Brien covered the event.

Trump has a rally scheduled in Dallas next week.
description: President Trump held a rally in Louisiana on Friday night, and he did not mince words about his opponents..10/12/2019 2:49:47AM EST.
